name: nodejs-course-phase3
description: A bit more complicated sample project - phase 3
author: Dmitriy Butakov <dbutakov@lohika.com>

scripts.start: npm run db:start && nodemon --config conf/nodemon.json src/server.js
scripts.postinstall: docker run -p $npm_package_config_docker_port:3306 --name=$npm_package_config_docker_container -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=secret -e MYSQL_DATABASE=bookshelf -d $npm_package_config_docker_image && docker stop $npm_package_config_docker_container
scripts.uninstall: npm run db:stop || true && docker rm $npm_package_config_docker_container
